}
}
}

        addresses {
            addressType
            city
            countryCode
            countryName
            email
            firstName
            key
            lastName
            line1
            line2
            middleName
            name
            organization
            phone
            postalCode
            regionId
            regionName
            zip
        }
        businessCategory
        contacts (after: $after1, first: $first1, searchPhrase: $searchPhrase1) {
            edges {
                cursor

                    addresses {
                        addressType
                        city
                        countryCode
                        countryName
                        email
                        firstName
                        key

                        line2

                        zip

                    birthDate

                    id
                    lastName
                    memberType
                    middleName
                    name
                    organizationId
                    organizations {
                        businessCategory
                        description
                        emails
                        groups
                        id
                        memberType
                        name
                        outerId
                        ownerId
                        parentId
                        phones
                        seoObjectType
                    }
                    organizationsIds
                    outerId
                    phones
                    securityAccounts {
                        accessFailedCount
                        createdBy
                        createdDate
                        email
                        emailConfirmed
                        id
                        isAdministrator
                        lockoutEnabled
                        lockoutEnd
                        memberId
                        modifiedBy
                        modifiedDate
                        normalizedEmail
                        normalizedUserName
                        passwordExpired
                        permissions
                        phoneNumber
                        phoneNumberConfirmed
                        photoUrl
                        securityStamp
                        storeId
                        twoFactorEnabled
                        userName
                        userType
                    }
                }
            }
            items {
                addresses {
                    addressType
                    city
                    countryCode
                    countryName
                    email
                    firstName
                    key
                    lastName
                    line1
                    line2
                    middleName
                    name
                    organization
                    phone
                    postalCode
                    regionId
                    regionName
                    zip
                }
                birthDate
                firstName
                fullName
                id
                lastName
                memberType
                middleName
                name
                organizationId
                organizations {
                    addresses {
                        addressType
                        city
                        countryCode

                        key

                        name
                        organization
                        phone
                        postalCode

                        regionName
                        zip
                    }
                    businessCategory
                    contacts (after: $after, first: $first, searchPhrase: $searchPhrase) {
                        totalCount
                    }
                    description
                    emails
                    groups
                    id
                    memberType
                    name
                    outerId
                    ownerId
                    parentId
                    phones
                    seoObjectType
                }
                organizationsIds

                        fullName
                        id
                        lastName

                    normalizedEmail
                    normalizedUserName

                        description

                    securityStamp

                }
            }

            totalCount

        description

graphql.query:
query categories ($after: String, $first: Int, $storeId: String!, $cultureName: String, $userId: String, $currencyCode: String, $filter: String, $fuzzy: Boolean, $fuzzyLevel: Int, $facet: String, $sort: String, $categoryIds: [String]) {
    categories (after: $after, first: $first, storeId: $storeId, cultureName: $cultureName, userId: $userId, currencyCode: $currencyCode, filter: $filter, fuzzy: $fuzzy, fuzzyLevel: $fuzzyLevel, facet: $facet, sort: $sort, categoryIds: $categoryIds) {
        edges {
            cursor
            node {
                code
                hasParent
                id
                images {
                    group
                    id
                    name
                    relativeUrl
                    sortOrder
                    url
                }
                imgSrc
                level
                name
                outline
                outlines {
                    items {
                        id
                        name
                        seoObjectType
                    }
                }
                parent {
                    code
                    hasParent
                    id
                    images {
                        group
                        id
                        name
                        relativeUrl
                        sortOrder
                        url
                    }
                    imgSrc
                    level
                    name
                    outline
                    parent {
                        code
                        hasParent
                        id
                        imgSrc
                        level
                        name
                        outline
                        path
                        slug
                    }
                    path
                    seoInfo {
                        id
                        imageAltDescription
                        isActive
                        languageCode
                        metaDescription
                        metaKeywords
                        name
                        objectId
                        objectType
                        pageTitle
                        semanticUrl
                        storeId
                    }
                    slug
                }
                path
                seoInfo {
                    id
                    imageAltDescription
                    isActive
                    languageCode
                    metaDescription
                    metaKeywords
                    name
                    objectId
                    objectType
                    pageTitle
                    semanticUrl
                    storeId
                }
                slug
            }
        }
        items {
            code
            hasParent
            id
            images {
                group
                id
                name
                relativeUrl
                sortOrder
                url
            }
            imgSrc
            level
            name
            outline
            parent {
                code
                hasParent
                id
                imgSrc
                level
                name
                outline
                path
                slug
            }
            path
            seoInfo {
                id
                imageAltDescription
                isActive
                languageCode
                metaDescription
                metaKeywords
                name
                objectId
                objectType
                pageTitle
                semanticUrl
                storeId
            }
            slug
        }
        pageInfo {
            endCursor
            hasNextPage
            hasPreviousPage
            startCursor
        }
        totalCount
    }
}

query user(
$id: String
$userName: String
$email: String
$loginProvider: String
$providerKey: String
) {
user(
id: $id
userName: $userName
email: $email
loginProvider: $loginProvider
providerKey: $providerKey
) {
id
isAdministrator
userName
email
storeId
userName
userType
roles{
id
name
description
permissions
}
contact {
id
name
firstName
lastName
fullName
name
memberType
phones
addresses{
key
addressType
city
firstName
lastName
regionId
regionName
}
}
}
}
